title: Pixel 2 xl - shuts down when charging, does not recognize original c2c charger - only USB 2 C
content:
My Pixel 2xl shuts down randomly while charging. 
I won't be state side for the next year+  and the country I am in is not "on the list" of countries...

Even tho it is quite liberating shutting down my phone for 4-5 hours of slow charge, the people I answer to tend to not like it as much as I do.. 

I've tried factory reset and had no effect. 

Please.. PLEASE... help :) 

Cheers, 

Ram
